law.text:
The chief executive or governing body of each political subdivision of the state may:
Enter into a contract or lease with the state, or accept any loan, or employ personnel, and the political subdivision may equip, maintain, utilize, and operate any property and employ necessary personnel therefor in accordance with the purposes for which the contract is executed; and
Do all things and perform all acts deemed necessary to effectuate the purpose for which the contract was entered into in accordance with the Kentucky Emergency Operations Plan.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 38, effective July 15, 1998.
